title: Mated by the Wolf
description: Lana, the Big Bad Wolf, along with her husband the Biggest Baddest Wolf have expanded their family to include quintuplets and a pack of their own which includes Frank, Gunter and Anna. The love triangle (which infuriates the Alphas) between Frank, Gunter and Anna is resolved, but the problems that stem from Anna's ties to her old pack are coming back to the surface which brings danger to all and deadly conflict to their pack. Find out what happens next in book three of the wolves, Mated by the Wolf.
author: Cyndia Rios-Myers
